How to transfer the ownership of an event?

  1. Sign in to your eventyay account, then click on Manage Events under your profile.

  1. Click on Event Dashboard of the event you want to transfer the ownership.

  1. Click Settings on the top menu of the event.

  1. Continue to click on Transfer Event button inside the Transfer Ownership tab.

    Notice: You’ll lose all the owner rights once the other user accepts the invitation for ownership.

5.You’ll be asked to re-enter the event’s name to confirm the transfer. Click Proceed once you are done.

  1. Input email of the new event’s owner. Tick the box to agree and press Transfer.

  1. The transfer will only be completed after the new owner accepts the role by clicking on the invitation link sent to their email from eventyay system.

    Notice: You’ll lose all the owner rights once the other user accepts the invitation for ownership.
